Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Diversey
ShortDescription: Eastbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Diversey: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, Milwaukee and Diversey: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Diversey.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Harrison/Throop
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted Harrison, Racine, Van Buren, Ashland and Harrison, due to street blockage near Harrison/Throop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted Harrison, Racine, Van Buren, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Harrison, due to street blockage near Harrison/Throop.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
